HomePage.metaTitle: Age Calculator: How Old Am I Exactly in Hijri and Gregorian?
HomePage.metaDescription: Use the accurate 'How Old Am I' calculator to find out your age in detail (years, months, days) in both Gregorian and Hijri calendars. Enter your date of birth and find out when your next birthday is!
HomePage.mainTitle: Accurate Age Calculator â€“ Calculate Your Age in Years and Days
HomePage.intro: 'How Old Am I' is your ideal tool to calculate your age accurately and easily in both Gregorian and Hijri calendars. Ever wondered, 'how old am I exactly in years, months, and days?' or 'when is my next Hijri birthday?'. We provide you with comprehensive and detailed answers.
HomePage.howItWorksTitle: How does the 'How Old Am I' calculator work?
HomePage.howItWorksDesc: Simply, choose your preferred input method (Gregorian or Hijri), then enter your date of birth using the dropdown menus for day, month, and year. After clicking the 'Calculate Your Age' button, our smart tool will display a set of valuable information about your age.
HomePage.whatYouGetIntro: When using the 'How Old Am I' calculator, you will get:
whatYouGetPoints: Your age in the Gregorian calendar: detailed in years, months, and days.
Your age in the Hijri calendar: detailed in years, months, and days.
Your corresponding birth date: If you enter your birth date in Gregorian, the tool will display the corresponding Hijri date, and vice versa.
A live counter for your age: Watch your age increase before your eyes in years, months, days, hours, minutes, and even seconds!

The countdown to your next birthday: Get ready for your next celebration! The tool accurately displays the remaining time until your next birthday, whether Gregorian or Hijri, based on your date of birth input method.
HomePage.whyUseTitle: Why use the 'How Old Am I' website?
HomePage.whyUseDesc1: The 'How Old Am I' tool is designed to be easy to use with a full English interface that supports left-to-right alignment. We use precise algorithms for age calculation and date conversion, considering the details of both calendars to provide reliable results. Whether you want to know your age for a special occasion, to track the passage of time, or just out of curiosity, 'How Old Am I' is your first destination.
HomePage.whyUseDesc2: Note: Age calculation in the Hijri calendar is based on the tabular (civil) Hijri calendar and may differ by one day from the calendar based on moon sighting, like the Umm al-Qura calendar. Enjoy discovering the details of your age and share the site with your friends!

AboutPage.metaTitle: About Us? The 'How Old Am I' Team | Our Mission and Vision for the Age Calculator
AboutPage.metaDescription: Meet the passionate team behind the 'How Old Am I' website. Discover our mission to provide an accurate and easy-to-use age calculator that supports both Hijri and Gregorian calendars, and our vision to serve you better.
AboutPage.title: About Us
AboutPage.p1: Welcome to 'How Old Am I'! We are a team passionate about providing easy-to-use and useful tools for everyone. Our primary goal with this site is to offer an accurate and reliable age calculator that lets you know your age in detail in both Gregorian and Hijri calendars.
AboutPage.p2: We understand that knowing one's age accurately, or tracking the time left for a special occasion like a birthday, can be important for many. Therefore, we have worked to develop the 'How Old Am I' tool to be simple in its design, powerful in its functions, and fully supportive of the English language to provide the best possible user experience.
AboutPage.p3: At 'How Old Am I', we believe that technology should serve people, and we strive to make information related to time and dates accessible and easy to understand. Our calculations are based on standard algorithms to ensure accuracy as much as possible, taking into account the differences between the Gregorian and Hijri calendars.
AboutPage.p4: Thank you for visiting our site and using our tool. We hope you find it useful and enjoyable. If you have any suggestions or feedback, do not hesitate to <link>contact us</link>. We are always happy to hear your opinions, which help us develop and improve our services.

PrivacyPage.metaTitle: Privacy Policy for 'How Old Am I' | How We Protect Your Data
PrivacyPage.metaDescription: Discover how 'How Old Am I' protects your privacy. In this privacy policy, we explain how your data is processed (and not collected) when using the age calculator, and our commitment to protecting your information.
PrivacyPage.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPage.p1: At 'How Old Am I', the privacy of our visitors is of extreme importance to us. This privacy policy document outlines the types of personal information that are not collected or received by 'How Old Am I' and how the information is (or is not) used.
PrivacyPage.processedInfoDesc: When you use the age calculator tool on 'How Old Am I', all the data you enter (date of birth) is processed directly in your browser (Client-Side). We do not collect, store, or transfer the dates of birth or any other personal information you enter into the age calculator on our servers. The entire process is done locally on your device.
PrivacyPage.cookiesDesc: 'How Old Am I' may use essential cookies to improve the user experience and ensure the site functions correctly. These files do not track personal information. We may use third-party analytics services (like Google Analytics) that may use cookies to collect non-personal information about how visitors use the site (such as pages visited, duration of visit, etc.). This information helps us understand how our site is used and improve it. You can choose to disable cookies through your browser settings.
PrivacyPage.sharingDesc: We do not share any personal data with third parties, simply because we do not collect it through the age calculator tool. Aggregated analytical information (if any) is anonymous and used only for site improvement purposes.
PrivacyPage.linksDesc: Our site may contain links to other sites. If you click on a third-party link, you will be directed to that third party's site. Note that we do not operate these external sites. Therefore, we strongly advise you to review the Privacy Policy of these websites. We have no control over and assume no responsibility for the content, privacy policies, or practices of any third-party sites or services.
PrivacyPage.securityDesc: Since we do not collect birth date data on our servers, the risk of this data being compromised on our end is non-existent. The security of your data when entered locally depends on the security of your device and browser.
PrivacyPage.changesDesc: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes. Changes to this Privacy Policy are effective when they are posted on this page.
PrivacyPage.contactDesc: If you have any questions or suggestions about our Privacy Policy, do not hesitate to <link>contact us</link>.
